titleStmt.title: Some useful reflections upon a pamphlet called A brief account of the intended Bank of England, whereunto is annexed a short description of Doctor Chamberlens's bank.
titleStmt.author: Chamberlen, Hugh.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.S. and sold by Randal Taylor near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Hugh Chamberlen by Wing.
Incorrectly identified as Wing C1892B on reels 2047 and 2509.
Reproduction of originals in the Sutro Library, the British Library, and the Folger Shakespeare Library.
